categories: Category:Star Wars: The Jedi Academy Trilogy

nodes.text: Star Wars: Jedi Trilogy Boxed Set

The Star Wars: Jedi Trilogy Boxed Set collects the three volumes of author Kevin J. Anderson's Star Wars: The Jedi Academy Trilogy, which includes the Star Wars Legends novels Jedi Search, Dark Apprentice, and Champions of the Force. The set was originally published by Bantam Spectra on October 6, 1997, and was later reissued with the Legends banner by Del Rey.
